strapiPost.title: Trailblazers and Bike.POC Host Pass The Mic Panel At Crystal Bridges
strapiPost.content:
Pass the Mic with Bike.POC and Trailblazers will bring together community voices to share stories of history, family, and culture around the outdoors in a free event at Crystal Bridges on Jun 8, from 7-9p.

  • Panelists: Jaclyn House of Good Day NWA will moderate a conversation with speakers from the cycling community like Bicycle Nomad founder Erick Cedeño, Mayor Lisa Gilbert of Elaine, AR, and co-founder of NWA Black Heritage Sharon Killian as they share stories from their perspective as minority riders.
  • Better Together: Presented by Bike.POC and Trailblazers, the Pass the Mic Series features in-person panel discussions intended to bring the NWA community together to listen, learn, and determine ways to better diversify our region’s trails, cycling, and active transportation scene.

Learn more about the speakers and reserve your free tickets HERE.
